answers.answer: I would bring this up to your Dr .
Well they just randomly swelled up tonight i have a dr apt tommorow morning  im 36+2
Thats good you have an appointment tomorrow... Have they talk to you about preeclampsia ?
No i have done reserch on line if my face or next swells go in its my first so im just making sure

That happened to me at 36 weeks and I ended up having severe pre-eclampsia. Some swelling is normal, but my face, lips, and eyes would swell up too in the morning. I hope in your case it's just normal swelling!
Yeah any sudden swelling can be pre eclampsia so talk to your dr in the morning. Also elevate your feet and drink some water hopefully everything turns out all right
Thanks ladies i will talk to ny dr tommorow for sure i get checked tommorow to see for dialtion

I had really bad swelling with my first pregnancy. They checked me like 2-3 in the hospital whole I was in labor.and that was on a good that of swelling that they worried. I just had lots of water it was crazy. Just a positive story of someone swelling I guess since I wasn't diagnosed. Oh and I started swelling at around 32 weeks.
Thats makes me feel a lil better ill keep yall updated

question: My feet anf ankles and calves are swollen is there at aby point i should be worried i know it normal but making sure
title: swollen
